titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Roger E. Jacobi scrapbook

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: University of Michigan alumnus and former member of the University of Michigan Marching Band. Following graduation, Jacobi taught instrumental music in the Ann Arbor Public Schools, wrote the Tappan fight song, ran the University's Midwestern Conference on School Vocal and Instrumental Music, served as Professor of Music and Associate Dean for the University of Michigan School of Music, and served as President at the Interlochen Center for the Arts.
archdesc.scopecontent: Scrapbook containing photographs, clippings, programs, and newsletters relating to the University of Michigan Bands. Included are photographs and other materials from the University of Michigan Marching Band's trip to the 1948 Rose Bowl, programs from University of Michigan concerts and recitals, and materials from the University of Michigan Band Alumni Association.
